item.title: China Deprives Japan of Rare-Earths Supply, Escalating Dispute
item.description: Beijing is punishing Tokyo for Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s remarks on Taiwan, again wielding critical minerals as an economic weapon.

item.title: China Detains Church Leaders as Crackdown on Religion Intensifies
item.description: Authorities have taken away at least four members of a high-profile “house church” in Sichuan province as a campaign to root out religious organizations beyond the state’s control intensifies.

item.title: Cambodian Scam Tycoon Wanted by U.S. Extradited to China
item.description: The Justice Department accused Chen Zhi of running a sprawling scam empire targeting Americans.

item.title: China’s Forex Reserves Rose in December as Yuan Debate Mounts
item.description: China’s foreign-exchange reserves rose in December amid a weaker dollar, wrapping up a year marked by a ballooning trade surplus.

item.title: China Ramps Up Dispute With Japan
item.description: Beijing banned exports to Japan that could have military uses, escalating a feud over Taiwan.

item.title: China Warns AI Startups Seeking to Emulate Meta Deal: Not So Fast
item.description: Beijing worries the $2.5 billion acquisition of startup Manus will encourage more entrepreneurs to follow in its footsteps.

item.title: Maduro’s Capture Threatens China’s Ambitions in Latin America
item.description: Beijing has steadily built relationships over the past two decades in Washington’s backyard.

item.title: China Signals It Won’t Give an Inch to the U.S. in Latin America
item.description: Beijing is doubling down on its expansion just as President Trump tries to claim the Western Hemisphere as an exclusive sphere of influence for the U.S.

item.title: Xi Says China Hit 2025 Growth Target Despite Economic Headwinds
item.description: The leader’s New Year speech is an opportunity to communicate directly with the Chinese people and provided an insight into his priorities.

item.title: Five Takeaways From China’s Military Drills Around Taiwan
item.description: Beijing encircled the island this week and warned outsiders to stay away.

item.title: India Is on a Himalayan Building Spree to Prepare for a Clash With China
item.description: A deadly standoff jolted India to stitch together a huge network of roads, tunnels and landing strips needed to move soldiers and supplies to the mountainous border region.
